meanings.sent1: The paneled walls in the room gave it a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: The old house had beautifully paneled doors.
meanings.sent3: The paneled ceiling made the room look like a fancy library.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and inviting as a paneled room.
meanings.sent5: The paneled furniture added a touch of elegance to the office.

meanings.sent1: The paneled cabinet was sturdy and well-built.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter crafted a paneled door for the entrance.
meanings.sent3: The paneled bookshelf was so heavy it almost fell over!
meanings.sent4: His voice was as smooth and polished as a paneled surface.
meanings.sent5: The paneled fence enclosed the garden beautifully.

meanings.sent1: The paneled room was filled with antique furniture.
meanings.sent2: The mansion had a grand staircase with paneled walls.
meanings.sent3: The paneled wardrobe was so big, it could fit a whole family inside!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the paneled hallways.
meanings.sent5: The paneled bar added a touch of sophistication to the restaurant.
